snippet.title: Maximum Apocalypse: The Video Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to the official digital video game adaptation of Rock Manor Games’ Maximum Apocalypse, a 1-6-player cooperative roguelike adventure set in a post-apocalyptic world where civilization has already fallen.

Follow Maximum Apocalypse on Kickstarter: https://bit.ly/MCSMAKSS
Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/MCSMASMSteam
Join the conversation on Discord:  https://discord.gg/megacat
For more on Mega Cat Studios and our games, please visit: https://megacatstudios.com/
